newsitem.title: UK: UK meals and feeds follow lower Chicago futures.
newsitem.headline: UK meals and feeds follow lower Chicago futures.

text.p: UK meals and feeds prices were mostly lower on Thursday following the easier Chicago soymeal futures close the previous night.
Ex-mill and store high protein soymeal sellers were around four stg down while Brazilian material was two stg lower.
Brokers reported interest in forward high pro but no significant business was reported.
In the remainder of the market rapemeal ex-mill Erith was two to three stg down while Hull and Liverpool offers were unchanged.
Sunflower pellets and meal were down around one stg while corn gluten feed pellets shed two to three stg a tonne.
